docs.text: Welcome to Henry's Blog (Demo) The page is the place which shows the project of Henry and friends For more information about the team's project, visit picopiece.com . Pico projects: IoT Stack - Create a full IoT Stack projects which include all layers from hardware to user GUI Cloud-based IoT Stack - Start the real-time IoT application with minimum investigation Node-RED - Flow-based control logic builder and introduction to OpenJS Tasmota - All-in-one device firmware controller that match with most of common ioT devices Projects implementation https://github.com/hieubkhcm/picopiece # All the projects will frequently update and be listed here

docs.text: Henry Le Software engineer, open-source lover, trilingual speaker Hey, I'm Henry! I'm a software engineer working in Taiwan. Welcome to my playyard on the web for the projects I am currently working on, tutorials, DIY hobbies and anything else that I want to share to the world. Here is some random facts about me: This is my very first website after starting to work as a 5G software engineer I once dropped out of school for 1 year and really paid for that I worked as a teacher for 3 years before becoming a developer I love all kind of budgies I love Starcraft II and Torchlight II but never good at them Connecting You can contact me by hieubkhcm@gmail.com to drop any Hi! 你好! or Xin chào! I am very glad to make friends. Github "looking to my eyes"
